website_summaries.verdict: Powerful washer designed for medium to heavy duty applications.
pros: Includes dual soap tanks, 0-, 25-, and 40-degree quick connect nozzles
Has hose reel and cable holder
cons: Not as compact as other models

website_summaries.verdict: An electric sprayer with a medium range of pressure that offers good quality for the price.
pros: Good for medium jobs and some heavier jobs
cons: If you want the soap applicator, surface cleaner or turbo nozzle included, the price will go up over $200

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be very aware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item one year ago and used it for one summer to wash my cars . I took it out of garage Apr 2019 to wash my car and it was not operating right no presure. I called Greenworks and they told me nothing they could do. So if you buy this item make sure you buy a very long warrantee
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Motor Failed on Second Use; Forever to reach Greenworks- Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about an hour great. A week later the motor hummed and then quit. A 25 minute wait calling the 888 Greenworks number got me a nice later who offered to replace it in 7-15 days. Said their warehouse was super busy (from idiots like me who bought a Greenworks product).
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Potential home workhorse here!
customer_reviews.text: Initial review after 5 hours steady use with two nozzles; the soap nozzle worked great as did the ‘white’ 30degree pattern nozzle. Jobs were 20% windows/doors and the remaining work concrete and paver stones cleaning. Compressor ran smoothly and stream was consistent throughout the 5 hours. Cons: Not very maneuverable, and storage is not clearly detailed - Where does everything pack when folded? Pros: Price, fittings work well, overall size when in compact or storage position and pressure hose reel. Longevity could move rating to the five star review.
customer_reviews.author: M. McClain

customer_reviews.title: Broke After Three Uses
customer_reviews.text: Not reliable enough. I purchased this two years ago and have used it maybe 3-4 times, storing in my garage in between uses. Took it out for season 3 to pressure wash my house and the housing has cracked and the water leaks out. The company has been unresponsive to assist me. Flimsy 1 year warranty means I will likely need to purchase a new one. Save yourself the cash and get a more expensive, higher quality model.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: It did not work out of box. Returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: Trevor H

customer_reviews.title: Terrible hose and whine when using
customer_reviews.text: Worked decent on first use, hose kinked way too easily and even arrived with a kink in the hose where the hose goes into the machine at the hose reel. Get no pressure due to the kinks and can’t get the kinks out since the hose is so cheaply made. The second time I used it it’s giving me a whining noise every time it starts/stops when I use the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one use!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this April 18, 2018 my husband used it once last spring. He pulled it out os storage and it is Leaking and can’t use! Pretty expensive to use once! Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Martin

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but will overheat and just stop after about 45 min, will work again later.
customer_reviews.text: Weird that the design of this thing is to just shut off when it overheats no blinking codes or warning or anything, just stops. You have to let it cool a bit and then get going again. Also best to just keep the trigger pulled on the whole time you use it or else sometimes it gets stuck trying to re-pressurize and won't go full on.
customer_reviews.author: Tarasso

customer_reviews.title: Great with a few caveats
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pressure washer for home use mostly. It blows through soap solution like crazy when using the black soap tip. It will literally go thru one of the filled bottle in about 1 minute. That is not a exaggeration. Gonna look into a foam cannon attachment. Also this things maneuverability is horrible when everything is plugged in. You have the water hose out one end, the electrical plug out the other,. And the wand hose out the top. Quite the pain. Either way you pull it a line is in the way. That being said,. It works amazing well and is quite powerful enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: SW2

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made..
customer_reviews.text: Only had this for 2 1/2 months and it already gave out on me on the 4th use. Water hose completely bursted on both ends. Tried to call to get a replacement but no luck... Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended NOT to run chlorine through this system.
customer_reviews.text: This Greenworks 1950 PSI is a wonderful little unit providing adequate power and convenience for our pool deck and pool screen enclosure. All attachments worked as expected and the ease of use was rather impressive. I have used 5000 PSI and that kind of power is unnecessary and quite excessive for. cleaning gutters, siding, screen structures and pool decks. And, no starters to yank and yank while playing with a choke. Hose and power cords are both surprisingly long. All fittings were simple and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Milwaukeeroad

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the real deal. I purchased the soap attachment and the surface cleaner attachment, but haven't had to use them yet. The Pressure washer comes with several hose attachments for different types of spaying and pressures. It got our very dirty driveway and sidewalk VERY clean. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in the spring. It worked great for one full weekend. I got it out of my garage this fall and it has not worked. It's having electrical issues. It will not start correctly. It trips my home's circuit breakers. I took it to my neighbors and plugged it in and it did the same thing. I email the company a while ago and there's been no response. I'm past the point to return it to Amazon so I'm stuck with a pressure washer that worked for 1 full weekend. Save your money and purchase a gas model. If you are planning to get electric then I would avoid this one.
customer_reviews.author: Trent Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works Great !
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law had 1 of these but a little less power. It broke so I bought a higher pressure 1 because I use it a lot more then she does. The pressure washer was pretty much all assembled right out of the box. I just hooked up the water and power and she has been working ever since then, I've had it for a couple of months now. Works really good down here in Florida for cleaning driveways, sides of house , and cars too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jurban Sr

customer_reviews.title: Fried GFCI outlets
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to set up and use. Felt like washer worked well. Then it fried 2 GFCI! So now electrical work has been added to do list on top of having to pay for pressure washing. Beyond frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great power washer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this power washer to use on our deck. I had no trouble with setting up or using the power washer. I don't have any specific things to review. It did the job that I purchased it for and I see myself using it a lot in the future (fence, driveway, front porch).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent power washer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power washer, bought it to power washing old deck, just enough pressure to do the job without stripping the wood. Everything came assembled, and with all the necessary accessories, including turbo nozzle. Took it out of the box, unfolded the handle, plugged it in, connected the water hose, and it was ready to go. Looks and feel quality product with good use of brass for important area. The hose and the pressure hose is long enough to do most jobs. Happy with the purchase, and will recommend..
customer_reviews.author: KSISO

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, easy to use, gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this -- my first pressure washer -- to wash a deck and railing. It did the job well. I suppose a higher-pressure washer might've made the job a bit quicker, but since I don't do it too often this one is a good performance/size/cost compromise. I really like the low-profile design; in the past I've used upright pressure washers which frequently fall over when there's any tug on the hose.
customer_reviews.author: lniles

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I've used this twice so far. I used it once to wash my cars. It didn't do a very good job of that, but I was very concerned about not damaging my car paint, so I probably didn't get as close as I could have. It did put a nice soap foam on the car using the soap attachment. It worked very well for my house, vinyl siding. It even sprayed away the wasps I disturbed while cleaning by an attic vent. I like being able to roll up the sprayer. Hopefully I won't have reliability issues as others have, but I'll update further if I do.
customer_reviews.author: JekiTheRogue

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the sprayer
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the sprayer. My expectations weren't super-high as this is only a $100 sprayer. I used this to clean up a cement patio that hadn't been resurfaced in years. I ran it for almost four hours and there wasn't one hiccup. The best thing about this is the quick setup and teardown. It's light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: chrispop

customer_reviews.title: Great for the house
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It is great for day to day cleaning. We use it regularly for the pool deck cleaning along with the exterior walls and windows. The included tips pretty much cover everything you will need. We haven't even had to use the soap banks, but it is nice to have them there if wanted to use. Only thing i would use this for is a deep cleaning of the entire drive way and sidewalks. For that, stick with the pros with their more powerful tools and the cheap deals.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and no manufacturer support.
customer_reviews.text: The pressure did not come with the soap tip. If you notice on the picture, there is a red, yellow, green, and black tip. You can only use soap with the black tip. None was included with mine. I contacted the manufacturer per Amazon's instructions and have received radio silence. I can only imagine future support will be as good. Zero confidence and do not recommend supporting this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: DeBo

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but after 3 uses it would only run for 5 minutes then It would shut off, still had power but it wouldn’t run, so I would have to let it sit for 10 minutes before it would work again. Also soap dispenser would not work at all. Very disappointed, returning it tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Will not last, not recommend to buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in June 2017, and lasted almost two years, it simply died after having been used a handful of times. Greenworks has 4 year warranty but only one for powerwashers.... so not happy, this thing will not last and they know it.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Sanz

customer_reviews.title: Nice pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: It works nicely when used with a snow foam gun (not included). really like two built in soap dispensers. additional nozzles ( not included) add flexibility. The low pressure soap nozzle worked much better than I expected. The green nozzle cleared the soap well. Cons: Difficult to move on grass. It struggled with sewer jetting.
customer_reviews.author: Gayton Marks

customer_reviews.title: This machine died after 7 hours of use
customer_reviews.text: after about 7 hours of usage this machine is now operating at about half power. The return window of I guess 30 days expired 5 days ago. I am extremely disappointed that something this expensive crapped out this fast. I hope someone at Amazon can make this right
customer_reviews.author: CNMNMNC

customer_reviews.title: This works ver ywell
customer_reviews.text: Just put 9 hours on the machine and I really like it. It has enough power to clean gunky aggregate with the spray tip but light enough to move and store easily. Love the electric start (vs the gas pull start I used to have). However, the 11" surface cleaner attachment wasn't very effective so I may return that. I'm a 60+ year old woman.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Works well, you just have to make sure you ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, you just have to make sure you beed all the air out of the system. I did wish there was no gfci as all my outlets already have one and using two gfci's in series can cause interference and lead to false trips. Hasn't been a problem yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised-great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well thought out design. Having a hose reel is convenient. One minor shortcoming is the cord holder is too low and drags on the ground when moving, wearing through electrical cord. Easily fixed with some velcro. Has a good amount of cleaning power. Mine arrived with the one wheel smashed. A call to the help line was easy and I had a replacement (at no cost) within a week.
customer_reviews.author: MichiganReview

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sue this works great but I've had a medical ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sue this works great but I've had a medical issue that keeps me from getting wet below the waist meaning I can['t go around power washing anything until the doctor gives me clearance. I'm pretty sure I'll be finding out how good this is next March, April or May. Based on all the other Greenworks things I've purchased I have no concerns that this will equal expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Fox

customer_reviews.title: Used it twice and it seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Instructions on how to store tools on the chassis are not enlightening, but I was able to get them all aboard OK. Washer performed OK the two times I have used it. So: So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Math Blogger

customer_reviews.title: Weak cord reel, but the unit is fine.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine other than the extremely weak cord reel. I wish they had included a wand extension. No reliability issues to mention. Also, it's stable and has enough pessure to clean the car and the sidewalk. Not strong enough to easily clean concrete or reach the 2nd floor of your home (they don't make that claim, but I figured someone would ask).
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: I just wish I had bought this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy an electric pressure washer but I have no regrets. This thing is wonderful. With a foam cannon I can soap my vehicles and with the cleaner attachment I cleaned my whole driveway for 2 hours straight and the machine performed flawlessly even with my low water pressure foucet.
customer_reviews.author: C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Lot better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer turned out to be so, so much better than expected. This machine has a enormous amount of pressure, to be an electric model. Very easy to use. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Dingler

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, little confusing to use until you read directions. Lasted exactly 23 months then motor shorted out with light use, probably used 15 times.
customer_reviews.author: mike henkin

customer_reviews.title: Pressure Washer or Pressure Rinser.
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washer? More like water rinser. Maybe it's just me, but I came from using a gas powered pressure washer that was able to get the job done. I was excited to use this as I wanted to get away from gas, but the pressure just doesn't compare. I could barely remove light stains from concrete with any of the nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Green ia good!!!
customer_reviews.text: The power of the device was more than sufficient. It was relatively easy to use. be sure to use an extension cord that can handle the power required to run the device. if the cord gets hot the device will shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Use it every year.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this on our deck for a few years now, but this year our daughter used it on the barn and on the one side of the house. Easy to use and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Top body cavity fills with splashed water -- it should ...
customer_reviews.text: Top body cavity fills with splashed water -- it should drain so you don't have to tip/dump the whole machine to drain it.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this pressure washer has been great. I only gave it 4 stars because it is not really industrial strength. It is adequate for a home owner like me who occasionally needs to clean a deck or sidewalk or paint the house, but professionals would need something a little more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Henry

customer_reviews.title: Oh and it cleans well also
customer_reviews.text: Best dang lawn edger (yes lawn edger - a chance encounter cleaning a sidewalk had it cutting the grass against the cement - then I did the whole lawn.) I ever bought; Oh and it cleans well also.
customer_reviews.author: D. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Portability and Well-Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power washer. Used to clean my patio and with with the right products, it helped to remove aged stains in the patio concrete. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Gemma Finds

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Washer!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how I get about this design at first but now I love it! It is simple to maneuver and easy to attach a hose to. The power worked well with our rather dirty patios.
customer_reviews.author: Keven Rinaman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is very easy to use, quiet and effective. I had some doubts about its effectiveness when I bought it but it turned out to be powerful enough to do just about everything i needed it for. I was able to power wash paint off my deck, for example. Since it's electric, it is pretty quiet and light.
customer_reviews.author: Joachim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.text: We have used only twice thus far. Easy to setup and powerful enough to do a great job on the driveway. We have not attempted to use the soap function as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't start. We called Greenworks several times and no answer, and we emailed them twice and no response. Returning before it's too late to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I have used this washer for about 20 hours over ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this washer for about 20 hours over two years. The washer hose leaked after the first ~4 hours of use. The company finally sent a replacement despite claiming it was normal wear and tear. Now the motor capacitor has failed and having it replaced will be more than the machine originally cost. Looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the engine is on before you try using it
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried it out, I was disappointed because I thought the pressure wasn't high enough... turns out I hadn't turned it on lol. So make sure you hear the engine going BEFORE you try pressure washing anything, lol usually works better that way. Now I can't get enough of it... dreading to see my water bill this month.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Robb

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Impression after one week of ownership. I'm very happy with this purchase after two car washes and driveway cleaning. This pressure washer is simple to use and perform the job nicely. For storage, the handle folds down for a nice compact package. I thought about getting the standup version (1951) but didn't want to pay the extra price for the same functionality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fang

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Pressure is as described. Works great. Recommend getting a wand extension kit. Better than getting on a ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good electric pressure washer and very easy to use. I use it for detailing.
customer_reviews.author: JGrubb

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Designed to be easy to use, adapts to a variety of pressures and spray patterns. Really good for use around the house and grounds.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Franks

customer_reviews.title: Barely lasted a year.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water pressure a year ago in June 2016. Unfortunately, it lased only slightly over a year (16 months). Today, the motor went out. Not sure how long these are supposed to last - but I sure thought I would get more use out of it. I would have rated it a 5 because it was awesome, but due to the motor issues, it is getting a 1.
customer_reviews.author: smile123

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to use. Saves water when washing the car. Cleans off stubborn stains from driveway and the house. I especially like the windup hose - very nice feature. Rolls easily and not too heavy if you need to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: GreemWorks Electric Power Washer.
customer_reviews.text: Item built well looks great but seems to lack power for a the 1950 PSI rating. I have a 1850 PSI that seems stronger.
customer_reviews.author: MJT1

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job Done!
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning cars, spray/cleaning concrete, pressure wash restaurant hood. Got it on prime day and is a solid buy
customer_reviews.author: Glee Truong

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for an electric washer
customer_reviews.text: I used this pressure washer to clean my deck and my brother-in-laws deck. My deck had some green areas and dirt that were easily removed using the second-lowest pressure nozzle. It also cleaned my stone patio table easily. Even at that pressure I had to be careful not to remove the existing stain. It is light enough to move fairly easily and the length of the power cord and water hose were great for the job. After cleaning the deck I decided it needs to be restained and will use this to remove the old stain. My BIL's deck looked like it had never been stained or cleaned. The difference after cleaning was amazing! The deck looked almost new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Should be noted that I bought this during the today's deal sale so I paid half price for it. But I am really glad I did, I'm very impressed. And the varied pressures are perfect for household needs.
customer_reviews.author: Vino S Raj

customer_reviews.title: This is trash.
customer_reviews.text: It overheated and shut down and will not turn back on. The circuit breaker just trips right away. This thing is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This thing works great. Very rarely do I give a product 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great. Very rarely do I give a product 5 stars, but look at my pictures and see for yourself. We bought a house that had some black coloring on the porch and sidewalk, this ate it right off.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Works shortly
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for awhile then died. Had to do all the tests for the warranty. Just gave up and bought a different brand
customer_reviews.author: natalie stroup

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gor this for my husband and he is happy with it! Washed our siding and desk! Work great!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I prefer electric to gas powered and this is just as powerful. Great for any homeowner. I've cleaned the siding, driveway, sidewalks and back patio.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Small and maneuverable
customer_reviews.text: Everything is contained on the machine - easy to use - powerful
customer_reviews.author: RPS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I love the fact that it automatically ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.I love the fact that it automatically shuts off pump when you release the trigger. I ruined a $400 power washer because it didn't have that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cleans about anything cars, deck house patio. Takes a little getting used to selecting the proper nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Old George

customer_reviews.title: Another great greenworks product
customer_reviews.text: Used it to clean dirt of the sideing and to clean concrete patio, driveway and front walk. Preformed great. Easy to drag around and store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer meets all my expectations. The only downside is low GPM. But it is good for the price range. The hose reel works very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Richter

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great on my RV and the exterior of my house. It does suck up soap quickly so it would be nicer to have more capacity.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: TERRIFIC value. Great instructions. Simple to set up. Love the layout so it doesn’t fall over when being an old dude and power washing our driveway!!
customer_reviews.author: A Guy From Burbank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I had the same washer before and used extensively for several years. I gave to a neighbor when we moved who is still using it. The current washer arrived before the date projected. We have used it to very effectively clean several long walkways and a two-car width driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M McCreless

customer_reviews.title: it lets a great product down
customer_reviews.text: Least likeable thing is the cable storage, flimsy velcro wrap around. Such a shame, it lets a great product down.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this unit in April 2018. Used it three times since I owned it. Try to use a four-time today and no pressure from the unit. Purchased a new hose as recommended. Still doesn’t work. The next step is the trash bin.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all for an electric pressure washer. Don't waste your money on the surface cleaner though.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Daddy Fly Socks Soul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great power washer. Great price. Delivered on time. Easy to assemble and use. The power cord and the hose are extra long. I didn’t need to use an extension cord. Comes with multiple size nozzles. I used the widest one and it was perfect for cleaning my 6ft tall privacy fence.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was easy to set up and begin using
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, it was easy to set up and begin using. Initially I had a trouble getting it to run. The simple step was to follow the sequence of press reset, then turn on the device and then pull the trigger and it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay V.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My brother has a more vertical washer and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My brother has a more vertical washer and is always tipping over. This one glides easily over the deck with no tipping. It is very easy to hitch both power and hose.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Heavier,  ample power and build quality
customer_reviews.text: Good array of nozzles for all power wash situations, build quality is amazing for the price paid. Little heavier but can understand that this everything is inbuilt including the hose.
customer_reviews.author: Whoppin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: Great machine since we don’t have a large area with grass. Just make sure to charge the batteries and voila!
customer_reviews.author: Francys Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the summer time to wash people's cars, and can make a bit of extra cash by doing so!
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Soap dispenser drains superfast.  Powerful and not to loud.  Perfect for household use.
customer_reviews.text: I dont think this particular model is available anymore but nonetheless thwy all are probably quute similar. What i really like is the handle and wheels. It is powerful enough to cut through grime. The soap tanks drain out in a couple of seconds so ensure you are aiming at what needs the soap as it goes QUICKLY.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Pectol

customer_reviews.title: Good washer
customer_reviews.text: The washer is fine for light jobs but the way the pressure works is variable - at times you have pressure and at other times you don't. It's like the cycles of electricity. For tough jobs you still have to use the 0 (zero) nozzle to chip away at dirt and grime. It's for light home use, not for a shop. It can be used to clean your wood siding prior to painting, or to clean off your deck if mud or grit is there. I tried the washer on my sailboat to clean slim, grim, and fouling below the water line, even prepping with ON/OFF, a commercial acid-based cleaner, but it didn't work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice little unit. I have used it to power wash a house and wash two vehicles and it work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Piddlerdude

customer_reviews.title: I actually love the power washer however after 3-4 uses
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the power washer however after 3-4 uses, the power source will not reset. Called the company and they are covering it under warranty with a local repair shop. I am worried about this happening again though.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy - Junk
customer_reviews.text: Product died with less than 2 years light. Also hose broke about a year ago and I replaced with Flexzilla hose. Junk don't buy
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM PERRY

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Power Washer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Works as advertised. Used it to power wash my deck, screens and patio and it did a really nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Fbird67

customer_reviews.title: works fine.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Have used it 5 times. Patio, driveway, porch, fences.
customer_reviews.author: I. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Does not take up much space
customer_reviews.text: Works nice not to loud like the two sided soap spray. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power without failure
customer_reviews.text: After buying and returning two other brands we finally tried this brand (GreenWorks) from Amazon. It works without any difficulty or flaw. I am an industrial designer and am hyper critical - yet no complaints. I would buy this power washer again. It is a heavy, sturdy piece of equipment. This my first review on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan J

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my type of household usage. Siding, Concrete, etc.
customer_reviews.author: D. Podolsky

customer_reviews.title: Not working as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Soap tanks don't work. Does not dispense any soap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Elbert

customer_reviews.title: The hose reel is great.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as birthday gift to my husband. He really likes it. The hose reel is great.
customer_reviews.author: cindyb

customer_reviews.title: Don't fear the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the pictures speak for themselves. Small pressure washer good for medium to light duty jobs. Cleans the house, cleans the sidewalk, cleans the vehicles. Quiet and the motor only runs while the handle is depressed to spray.
customer_reviews.author: ROFLsplash

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed and returned
customer_reviews.text: Was not at all happy. Election cord was not long enough and pressure was not powerful enough It stopped once and I could never get it started
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice machine
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well, easy to use. The only problem I've had so far, it that my wife keeps taking it away from me to use it herself. Could be worse.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It's not working. It's waste my time. So i don't believe this Brand no mire. Just go home depot to looking for another better brand.
customer_reviews.author: clifford webb

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very portable.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it one time so far and it worked great.

customer_reviews.title: love it, only probably cord is to short to ...
customer_reviews.text: love it, only probably cord is to short to do the entire house and it say not put on an extents on cord. but easy to operate and move around and store

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Had the unit for 3 weeks now. Works great, saves water and saves time.

customer_reviews.title: power sprayer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric sprayer on the market to my estimation

product_meta.title: Greenworks 1950 PSI 13 Amp 1.2 GPM Pressure Washer with Hose Reel GPW1950
product_meta.description: GreenWorks offer a range of systems to choose from in corded and cordless tools. Leading in innovation, the corded Lawn system offers a variety of tools to get all your yard work done quickly and efficiently. Whether you need something economical or with greater performance, the GreenWorks Corded Lawn Tools provide reliable options without the hassle of gas or the high cost of operation throughout the years. Get started within seconds and leave the gas hassle behind. Choose from trimmers, chainsaws, mowers, snow throwers, dethatchers, pressure washers .
feature_bullets: Heavy duty 13 Amp induction motor will strip, brighten and clean your surfaces back to new
1950PSI and 1.2GPM makes removing stains effortless. Spray Gun Nozzle: Quick Connect
25 ft. high pressure hose and 35 ft. electric cable allow you to reach a larger
Dual built in soap tanks, 0, 25, 40 degree nozzle tips, wand and low pressure foam sprayer included
Compact design with wheels, hose reel and cable holder for easy storage and transportation
